cab.content: URANIUM SUPPLIES FROM NAMIBIANote by the Secretary of the Cabinet1. The subject of uranium supplies from Namibia is to be raisedorally at Cabinet on Thursday 29 January. This follows consideration bythe Defence and Oversea Policy Committee whose views will be reported to cabinet,2, In the meantime members of the Cabinet who are not members ofthe Defence and Oversea Policy Committee are being eent copies ofOPD(76) 3 and 5 and of OPD(76) 1st Meeting Minutes, Item 2, andOPD(76) 3rd Meeting Minutes (when available) which (ue relevant.Signed JOHN hunt cabinet Office27 January 1976C(76) 3 COPY NO 8127 January 1976CABINET
